Question: Recogni Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Recogni Inc

Phoenix ADAS/AD ECU

 - AI-based perception for autonomous vehicles
 - High-performance, power-efficient real-time object detection
 - Scalable and sustainable technology for automotive and intelligent autonomy markets
 - High frame rate and high-resolution camera support
 - Vision inference chip with one quadrillion operations per second capability
 - $48.9 million raised to advance AI-powered vision recognition module development
